item.title: Creating Beautiful Presentations with Story
item.description: class: title, smokescreen, shelf, no-footer background-image: url(leo-serrat-533922-unsplash.jpg) Creating Beautiful Presentations With Remark, Apron, Adirondack, and Descartes The Story Remark Themes Story offers helper themes for creating beautiful presentations with Remark, using simple Markdown to create slide layouts.
